snippet.title: Spook-A-Boo Game Trailer | Steam
snippet.description:
Spook-A-Boo is a physics-based couch co-op game set across multiple worlds haunted by mischievous ghosts. Play with friends and family as Ghost Hunters. Seek out the ghosts hidden inside objects using the Ghost Detector, bring them out using the Scanner, tether the ghost using the Spectral Blaster, and pull them to your Trap to capture them but be careful ghosts will resist by using their spectral powers.

Game Features
• A wide variety of naughty and quirky Ghosts loaded with annoying abilities interact with the environment to create unique and engaging gameplay experiences
• Fun light-hearted co-op gameplay
• Colourful spooky atmosphere with ghoulish decor and eerie tunes to perfectly set the fun ghost-hunting mood
• Easy to learn controls and mechanics
• Cute and abstract cast of playable characters

Important Links

• Steam Wishlist - https://store.steampowered.com/app/3154150/SpookABoo/
• Discord - https://discord.gg/TJFUj5rK7g
• Website - https://www.walainteractive.com/spook-a-boo
• X (Twitter)- https://twitter.com/SpookABooGame
• Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/SpookABooGame/
• Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/spook_a_boo_game/

Music Credits: https://uppbeat.io/browse/artist/pecan-pie
